revised_title: Exploring the Differences in Lichtenberg's Dust-Figures and Discharge Mechanisms
tldr: The author investigates the differences in Lichtenberg's dust-figures and identifies that the dendritic patterns of positive figures are correlated to the brush form of discharge, while the rounded patches of negative figures are due to the silent discharge of electrified winds. The study also explores the effects of different surfaces and air rarefaction on the resulting figures.
